Name: cartilage cancer
Definition: A connective tissue tumor that can be a benign chondroma or a maligannt chondrosarcoma.

Name: bone cancer
Definition: A connective tissue cancer that is located_in bone and is characterized by uncontrolled cellular proliferation that destroys normal bone tissue.

Name: giant cell tumor
Definition: A otosalpingitis which is persistent and long-lasting.

Name: hemangiopericytoma
Definition: A soft tissue cancer that is a soft tissue sarcoma and originates in the pericytes in the walls of capillaries.

Name: chondroblastoma
Definition: A cell type benign neoplasm that has_material_basis_in mesothelium.

Name: mesenchymoma
Definition: A sweat gland neoplasm that is composed_of outgrowths of myoepithelial cells from a sweat gland.

Name: synovium cancer
Definition: A connective tissue disease that results_in inflammation located_in synovial membrane that lines a synovial joint which causes pain and swelling.

Name: small cell sarcoma
Definition: A germ cell cancer that is derives_from a mixture of germs cells and embryonal cells.

Name: malignant fibrous histiocytoma of bone
Definition: A cell type cancer that has_material_basis_in abnormally proliferating cells derives from embryonic connective tissue that is capable of developing into connective tissue
Synonym: malignant fibrous Histiocytoma of the bone

Name: fibrosarcoma
Definition: A connective tissue cancer that has_material_basis_in fibrous connective tissue and characterized by the presence of immature proliferating fibroblasts or undifferentiated anaplastic spindle cells in a storiform pattern.

Name: extraosseous osteosarcoma
Definition: A connective tissue cancer that has_material_basis_in fibrous connective tissue and characterized by the presence of immature proliferating fibroblasts or undifferentiated anaplastic spindle cells in a storiform pattern.

Name: obsolete malignant extraskeletal cartilaginous and osseous tumor
Definition: A connective tissue cancer that has_material_basis_in fibrous connective tissue and characterized by the presence of immature proliferating fibroblasts or undifferentiated anaplastic spindle cells in a storiform pattern.

Name: obsolete non-traumatic tendon rupture
Definition: A connective tissue cancer that has_material_basis_in fibrous connective tissue and characterized by the presence of immature proliferating fibroblasts or undifferentiated anaplastic spindle cells in a storiform pattern.
Synonym: Nontraumatic rupture of tendons of biceps

Name: chondrosarcoma
Definition: A connective tissue cancer that has_material_basis_in cells derived from transformed cells that produce cartilage.

Name: lipomatous cancer
Definition: An inner ear disease which involves inflammation of the inner ear.

Name: obsolete Arenaviridae infectious disease
Definition: A (-)ssRNA virus infectious disease that results_in infection in rodents and humans

Name: myxosarcoma
Definition: A pyoderma that is characterized by brown

Name: histiocytoma
Definition: A muscular disease in which the muscle fibers do not function resulting in muscular weakness.

Name: myofibroma
Definition: A squamous cell carcinoma that has papillae

Name: obsolete recurrent peripheral primitive neuroectodermal tumor
Definition: A squamous cell carcinoma that has papillae

Name: pleural cancer
Definition: A connective tissue cancer that located_in the pleura.

Name: epithelioid sarcoma
Definition: A connective tissue cancer that is characterized by the presence of epithelioid cells forming nodular patterns and has_material_basis_in mesenchymal tissue.

Name: adult intracranial malignant hemangiopericytoma
Definition: A malignant ovarian germ cell neoplasm that is a teratoma containing variable amounts of immature (typically primitive/embryonal neuroectodermal) tissues

Name: Kaposi's sarcoma
Definition: A connective tissue cancer that derives_from lymphatic endothelium
